Company_Name: Cty Tai Chinh TNHH MTV Mirae Asset (Viet Nam)
Job: Chuyen Vien Quan Ly Tai San CNTT
Title: Chuyen Vien Quan Ly Tai San CNTT
Description: Theo doi quan ly va thuc hien cac nghiep vu lien quan den tai san CNTT cua MAFC: Cap phat va ho tro phoi hop IT cai dat thiet bi, thuc hien cac thu tuc theo dung quy dinh - luu tru chung tu ban giao/ thu hoi/ danh gia tinh trang thiet bi...; Theo doi, sap xep tai san CNTT trong kho theo dung danh muc  dang theo doi.; Theo doi so luong hang ton kho, kip thoi bao cao quan ly ve tinh trang ton kho de de xuat, thuc hien cac phuong an cap phat may, thanh ly hoac luan chuyen.; Tuan thu cac quy dinh ve quan ly kho va an toan PCCC, kiem tra thuong xuyen tinh trang kho va bao cao kip thoi cac van de phat sinh.; Khi co hop dong mua/ thue tai san tu doi tac, nhan vien Bo phan quan ly tai san CNTT phoi hop voi nhan vien phong IT phu trach nhan hang, kiem tra hang hoa thuc te ca ve so luong, chat luong, quy cach san pham; doi chieu voi ho so chung tu va ky nhan tren Bien ban ban giao.; Quan ly, theo doi, kiem tra doi soat va thuc hien thanh toan cac khoan chi phi dinh ky hang thang thuoc IT asset phu trach.; Xay dung ke hoach kiem tra, kiem ke tai san CNTT dinh ky hang tuan, quy, thang va trien khai phoi hop voi IT de thuc hien kiem ke kho tai san; Phoi hop xu ly cac van de lien quan sau kiem ke nhu cap phat, thu hoi, thanh ly...; Tong hop bao cao, danh gia tinh hinh su dung cac tai san, thiet bi, xem xet va len ke hoach bao duong, bao tri, sua chua khi co thong tin bao tinh trang thiet bi IT tu cac phong ban su dung.; De xuat, xay dung phuong an quan ly tai san CNTT va so hoa toan bo du lieu thong qua he thong hien co cua MAFC duoi su ho tro va giam sat cua Truong bo phan.; Thuc hien theo doi cac bien dong tai san tren he thong; Phoi hop voi phong IT de lam cac yeu cau chinh sua, bo sung co lien quan toi Asset IT tren he thong neu can thiet.; Tham gia vao viec xay dung quy che, quy dinh quan ly tai san cua MAFC.; Tiep nhan thong tin ung vien nhan viec tu phong nhan su va sap xep phoi hop IT cai dat va chuan bi thiet bi CNTT phu hop voi tung vi tri cua moi ung vien.; Tiep nhan thong tin nhan vien nghi viec de phoi hop IT xu ly du lieu va thu hoi tai san CNTT theo quy trinh.; Tiep nhan thong tin ve tinh trang tai san, thiet bi CNTT tu cac phong ban su dung de kip thoi xu ly va giai quyet trong thoi gian som nhat.; Tham gia hop thao luan va de xuat phuong an voi cac phong ban khi co yeu cau lien quan toi tai san CNTT.; Ngoai cac cong viec tren, nhan vien can thuc hien cac cong viec khac theo su phan cong cua Lanh dao Ban/Quan ly truc tiep.
Requirement: Cao Dang/ Dai Hoc cac chuyen nganh: Ky thuat, Thiet bi, xay dung; Bang cap tin hoc van phong; Cac bang cap, chung chi lien quan toi cong viec...(neu co); 03 nam tro len ve quan ly tai san, kiem ke tai san.; Co kien thuc ve thiet bi, tai san CNTT; Biet su dung phan mem quan ly tai san CNTT; Chu dong, nhiet tinh trong cong viec.; Chiu duoc ap luc, khong ngai kho.; Kha nang giao tiep tot.; Kha nang xu ly van de tot.; Co thai do cau thi.
Right: Che do dai ngo hap dan voi luong thang 13 va chuyen di mot tuan du lich tai Han Quoc de ghi nhan tat ca thanh tich va no luc cua ban tai Cong ty Tai chinh Mirae Asset Viet Nam.; 15 ngay nghi phep hang nam.; Kham suc khoe dinh ky va cac su kien cua cong ty.; Goi bao hiem cham soc suc khoe tu nhan vien cap cao tro len.; Moi truong tre trung, nang dong, khong gioi han rao can ve y tuong moi.; Co hoi thang tien noi bo linh hoat.
Place: 91 Pasteur, Phuong Ben Nghe, Quan 1, Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh, Viet Nam
Giới thiệu công ty:
Nhan biet duoc nen kinh te phat trien day tiem nang cua Viet Nam, vao nam 2006 Tap Doan Tai Chinh Mirae Asset da thanh lap Van phong dai dien Mirae Asset MAPS Asset Management. Va tiep theo vao thang 12 nam 2007, Cong ty Co Phan Chung Khoan Mirae Asset (Viet Nam) duoc thanh lap. Vao thang 11 nam 2010, chung toi da nhan duoc giay phep cua Ngan Hang Nha Nuoc Viet Nam de thanh lap cong ty tai chinh trong nuoc, tien nhung buoc xa hon trong ke hoach dau tu tai Viet Nam. Va sau mot nam chuan bi, Cong ty Tai Chinh Mirae Asset (Viet Nam) da khai truong hoat dong, cung cap cac dich vu tai chinh chat luong cho khach hang dua tren nen tang he thong cong nghe thong tin dong nhat va gop phan to lon vao su phat trien ben vung cua nen kinh te Viet Nam.
Sau hon 07 nam thanh lap va phat trien tai Viet Nam, cong ty Tai Chinh Mirae Asset da va dang gay dung hinh anh cua minh tren thi truong, cung cap nhieu dich vu tai chinh chat luong, phuc vu cho nguoi tieu dung tai Viet Nam.

*** Nguyen tac dau tu:
- Mirae Asset xac dinh kha nang canh tranh ben vung.
- Mirae Asset dau tu theo quan diem dai han.
- Mirae Asset danh gia rui ro dau tu voi loi nhuan ky vong.
- Mirae Asset de cao giai phap dua ra quyet dinh tren tinh than tap the.

*** Triet ly kinh doanh
Chung toi luon coi trong yeu to con nguoi va huong den tuong lai voi tu tuong khoang dat.

*** Tam nhin
La chuyen gia tai thi truong moi noi dua tren quan diem toan cau, chung toi tiep tuc tan dung nhung uu viet trong quan ly dau tu giup khach hang dat duoc cac muc tieu dai han.

*** Gia tri cot loi
- Khach hang la tren het - Thanh cong cua khach hang la thanh cong cua chung toi. Chung toi thiet lap va duy tri moi quan he mat thiet voi khach hang, tao dung mot cuoc song sung tuc cho khach hang bang nhung chien luoc dau tu da duoc cong nhan.

- Tinh khach quan - Chung toi danh gia co hoi mot cach khach quan. Tinh doc lap giup chung toi dua ra cac quyet dinh dap ung chinh xac nhu cau cua khach hang.

- Tinh tap the - Chung toi phat trien thong qua viec ton trong tung ca nhan va niem tin tren tinh than tap the. Muc tieu cua chung toi la xay dung mot che do thu hut nhan tai, trong do, tai nang luon duoc trong dung va co hoi thang tien ngang bang cho moi nguoi.

- Trach nhiem cong dan - La cong dan doanh nghiep nghiem tuc, luon y thuc sau sac trach nhiem cua minh, chung toi bu dap cho cong dong noi chung toi dang hoat dong va cam ket se tiep tuc co nhung dong gop thiet thuc cho

*** Mang luoi toan cau
Cong ty tai chinh TNHH MTV Mirae Asset (Viet Nam) la mot thanh vien cua Mirae Asset Financial Group (MAFG) - Mot to chuc toan cau co nguon goc tu Chau A va mang luoi rong khap tai cac Thi truong Dau tu.

Su hien dien cua MAFG trai dai tu cac Thi truong von trong Khu vuc Chau A Thai Binh Duong den nhung Thi truong Phat trien trong yeu tren toan cau. Van phong cua chung toi duoc trien khai mot cach chien luoc tai 12 Quoc gia, tu Hong Kong, Trung Quoc, An Do, My den Vuong Quoc Anh. Voi mang luoi toan cau rong, cho phep chung toi da dang hoa danh muc dau tu, cung nhu tim kiem va xac dinh cac nguon loi nhuan trong tuong lai.

Company_Name: Cong Ty Co Phan Giai Phap Phat Trien Tien Phong
Job: Lap Trinh Vien Phat Trien Phan Mem Di Dong Flutter (Mobile App)
Title: Lap Trinh Vien Phat Trien Phan Mem Di Dong Flutter (Mobile App)
Description: Phat trien phan mem ung dung tren thiet bi di dong (smart phone/tablet).; Phat trien ung dung Flutter voi trai nghiem nguoi dung muot ma, hieu nang cao, va tuong thich tren nhieu thiet bi (Mobile, Tablet).; Kiem soat chat luong code, dam bao tuan thu quy trinh phat trien du an.; Lam viec trong linh vuc cac giai phap lien quan den giam sat dieu khien tu xa qua mang khong day (WIFI, Zigbee, Blutooth, GSM 4G/5G), camera, IoT, va Big Data.; Cac cong viec khac theo su phan cong cua Manager.
Requirement: Co kinh nghiem lap trinh ung dung mobile Native (iOS Swift va Android Kotlin).; Co kinh nghiem lap trinh ung dung mobile bang Flutter : toi thieu 2 nam; Co kien thuc ve ve OOP, thiet ke he thong, cau truc giai thuat; Hieu sau ve kien truc ung dung (MVVM, Clean Architecture).; Toi uu hoa hieu nang (memory management, battery optimization).; Co kinh nghiem viet module Native cho Flutter la mot loi the; Tot nghiep cac truong dai hoc/cao dang lien quan den ky thuat.; Co tinh than trach nhiem, can than, trung thuc va kha nang tu duy tot; Co kha nang lam viec doc lap va lam viec theo nhom, hoan thanh cong viec dung tien do; Chu dong nghien cuu, cap nhat cong nghe moi
Right: Dong BHXH, BHYT day du va cac che do dai ngo khac ( nghi phep nam, thai san, cuoi hoi, om dau...)  theo Bo luat lao dong.; Cac che do luong thuong nhu: Duoc xet nang luong hang nam, thuong le, tet va luong thang 13.; Moi truong lam viec nang dong, chuyen nghiep, than thien va binh dang.; Co co hoi lam viec voi ban lanh dao Cong ty va hoc hoi nang cao ky nang nghe nghiep, thang tien.; Hang nam, vao ngay sinh nhat cong ty co to chuc hoi thao, du lich va giao luu giua cac phong ban va cac cong ty voi nhau.; Hang thang, Cong ty to chuc tiec sinh nhat cho nhan vien co cac ngay sinh trong cung thang.; Hang tuan co cac hoat dong the thao : Da banh, cau long giua cac bo phan trong cong ty.; Nghi mat hang nam...
Place: 108 Thong Nhat, Phuong Tan Thanh, Quan Tan Phu, Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh, Viet Nam

Company_Name: Cty Tai Chinh TNHH MTV Mirae Asset (Viet Nam)
Title: IT Service Desk
Description: Highly motivated tech-support professional skilled in troubleshooting, analyzing, and resolving complex technical problems, utilizing advanced resolution procedures in schools assigned. Provision of professional and high level customer service ensuring unresolved issues and queries are promptly escalated as per protocol.; To act as a single point of contact for all user incidents, requests and general communication.; To restore 'normal service operation' as quickly as possible in the case of disruption; To improve user awareness of IT issues and to promote appropriate use of IT services and resources.; Manage user communication and escalating incidents and requests using defined procedures.; Resolving requests required synthesizing information from teams/ units.
Requirement: Experience in IT Support for specialized finance is a plus; At least 01 year of experience working on system related to processing/supporting IT requirements; Have knowledge of SQL/MySQL/PostgreSQL language,... (select, update, insert, delete,...) Knowing how to use SQL is a plus.; Experience using ticket recording systems is an advantage.; Work in shifts and be prepared to work overtime when projects are deployed as needed by the company.; Be willing support team members/ related departments following assigned scope of work; Soft skills related to customer service are necessary for minimum requirements; Communication with calm, effectively, out-going, sense of humor, friendly and open-minded; Be able to work under high pressure.; High sense of responsibility in confidential matter; Good at computer skills (Word, Excel, Power point...)
Right: Attractive packages with 13th salary year-end bonus and a week trip to Korea in order to recognize all your good performance and effort at MAFC.; 15 days annual leave.; Annual health check, company events.; Annual healthcare insurance package from senior level and above.; Young and proactive environment; no barriers, no limitation for new idea.; Flexible internal career opportunity.
Place: 91 Pasteur, Phuong Ben Nghe, Quan 1, Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh, Viet Nam

Company_Name: Cong Ty Co Phan Vien Thong Fpt
Job: Nhan Vien Ky Thuat Vien Thong Fpt (Tay Ninh)
Title: Nhan Vien Ky Thuat Vien Thong Fpt (Tay Ninh)
Description: huc hien lap dat, bao tri va sua chua duong truyen internet va cac dich vu vien thong do FPT Telecom cung cap, tai khu vuc duoc phan cong.; Thuc hien cac cong viec bao duong dinh ky cho thiet bi ky thuat.; Ho tro va huong dan khach hang trong viec su dung dich vu: internet, truyen hinh, camera.; Khu vuc lam viec: uu tien khu vuc gan nha thuan tien di chuyen ho tro khach hang.; TP.Tay Ninh: 476 Duong 30/4, KP5, Phuong 3, TP.Tay Ninh, Tay Ninh; Tan Chau: 197 Ton Duc Thang, KP1, Thi Tran Tan Chau, Tay Ninh.; Trang Bang: Khu pho Loc An, Thi Xa Trang Bang, Tay Ninh (Canh trai Co.opmart)
Requirement: Nam tuoi tu 22-34. Tot nghiep Trung cap, Cao dang hoac Dai hoc chuyen nganh: Vien thong, Dien tu, Dien, Co khi, Tu dong hoa...; Khong yeu cau kinh nghiem. Se duoc dao tao trong qua trinh di lam.; Kha nang lam viec doc lap va lam viec nhom.; Trung thuc, can than va co trach nhiem.; Kha nang giao tiep tot.; Co phuong tien di chuyen (xe may).
Right: Thu nhap hap dan theo nang luc va theo hieu qua cong viec (muc luong on dinh tu 9.000.000 VND tro len).; Duoc tham gia day du bao hiem xa hoi, bao hiem y te, bao hiem that nghiep, ngay phep nam theo quy dinh cua phap luat.; Duoc dao tao chuyen mon ky thuat tu co ban den nang cao, phat trien cac ky nang trong cong viec.; Duoc huong cac che do phuc loi khac theo quy dinh cua cong ty nhu: teambuilding, Du lich he, kick off...; Moi truong lam viec nang dong, chuyen nghiep va than thien.
Place: 476 Duong 30/4, Khu Pho 5, Phuong 3, Thanh Pho Tay Ninh, Tay Ninh
Giới thiệu công ty:
Cong ty Co phan Vien thong FPT (ten goi tat la FPT Telecom) hien la mot trong nhung nha cung cap dich vu Vien thong va Internet hang dau khu vuc.
Thanh lap ngay 31/01/1997, khoi nguon tu Trung tam Dich vu Truc tuyen do 4 thanh vien sang lap cung san pham mang Intranet dau tien cua Viet Nam mang ten "Tri tue Viet Nam - TTVN", san pham duoc coi la dat nen mong cho su phat trien cua Internet tai Viet Nam

Company_Name: Cong Ty TNHH Cong Nghe Giao Duc Thong Minh Quoc Te S.E.N
Title: Business Development Executive
Description: Identify and build relationships with corporate clients, educational institutions, and partners who have a need for IELTS course; Understand customer needs, provide consulting, perform cost-benefit and needs analysis of existing/potential customers, negotiate, and be in charge of signing contracts with potential customers.; Build and maintain strong relationships with existing customers, provide excellent customer care, create trust, and ensure customer satisfaction by handling complaints about product quality, delivery time, and other concerns with dedication.; Serve as a key liaison between our sales team and training centers, schools, and other educational partners to ensure smooth order processing, contract execution, and customer satisfaction; Enthusiastically perform all activities that are requested by line manager
Requirement: Bachelor's degree in Economics, Business Administration, English, or related fields.; At least 1 - 2 years of experience in IELTS/ESL, preferably in the education or EdTech industry.; Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills.; Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment.; Proficiency in both English and Vietnamese.
Right: Salary range: competitive; Large-scaled and stable projects with full stack of advanced technologies; Working with IT experts, C-level executives at international partners; Professional development working environment; Friendly, funny working environment
Place: 50 Ton That Dam, Phuong Nguyen Thai Binh, Quan 1 (Online qua GG meet)

Job: Nhan Vien Ky Thuat - Pre Sales - Up To 14 Trieu - Di Lam Ngay
Title: Nhan Vien Ky Thuat - Pre Sales - Up To 14 Trieu - Di Lam Ngay
Description: Thuc hien cac cong viec : Khao sat, tu van, thiet ke, boc toan khoi luong, trien khai va giam sat thi cong cac he thong ELV - dien nhe va co dien trong cac du an cua cong ty.; Phoi hop cac phong ban de hoan chinh cac ho so thanh toan doi voi CDT va thau cong.
Requirement: Yeu cau tot nghiep Cao dang tro len uu tien cac nganh hoc: dien - dien tu, quan tri mang, hoac kien thuc lien quan den camera network, access control.; Co kinh nghiem tu van, thiet ke, boc toan khoi luong cho he thong CNTT, dien nhe cho cac trung tam du lieu, he thong dien nhe cho cac khach san, resort, chung cu, benh vien, nha xuong.; Co kinh nghiem tu van, thiet ke, boc toan khoi luong cho he thong chieu sang, dieu khien chieu sang, he thong luu dien UPS, tu dien, busway trong nha xuong, toa nha la mot loi the.; Co kinh nghiem thuc tien trong viec giam sat va trien khai thi cong he thong ha tang thong tin ELV - ME trong cac du an.; Biet ve SHOP DRAWING; Biet doc ban ve thi cong
Right: Thu nhap thoa thuan (tuy theo kha nang, kinh nghiem), tang luong neu dap ung tot cong viec duoc giao.; Ky HDLD, thuong Le, Tet, luong thang 13.; Tham gia tat ca cac bao hiem (BHXH, BHYT, BHTN,...); Co nhieu co hoi hoc hoi va thang tien.; Duoc dao tao ve kien thuc, ky nang, nang cao nang luc ban than.; Moi nam xet tang luong 2 dot.; Tang luong theo tham nien.; Du lich thuong nien trong va ngoai nuoc.
Place: So 2 duong so 16, KDC Lakeview City, Phuong An Phu, Thu Duc

Company_Name: CONG TY TNHH THUONG MAI DICH VU QUOC TE TRUONG THINH PHAT
Job: Nhan Vien Lap Dat Va Sua Chua May Tinh, May In, May Photocopy - Lam Viec Tan Binh
Title: Nhan Vien Lap Dat Va Sua Chua May Tinh, May In, May Photocopy - Lam Viec Tan Binh
Description: Lap dat moi va huong dan su dung cho khach hang, cac dong may trong van phong nhu may in, may tinh de ban, laptop, may scan, may photocopy.; Ho tro cai dat va xu ly loi trong qua trinh su dung cua nguoi dung thong qua dien thoai hoac cac phan mem ho tro truc tuyen nhu ultraviewer, teamviewer.; Den tan noi xu loi cho khach hang neu khong xu ly duoc tu dien thoai hay ultraviewer, teamviewer.; Co kien thuc ve mang may tinh, biet thiet lap IP tinh cho may tinh, may in, photocopy.; Cai dat driver cho may in, may photocopy, may scan.
Requirement: Tot nghiep Trung Cap chuyen nganh cong nghe thong tin (Dam me linh vuc cong nghe, giong noi pho thong); Thanh thao tin hoc van phong, mang internet, chia se thiet bi qua mang LAN noi bo.; Uu tien co kinh nghiem ve lap dat va sua chua may in, may tinh, may photocopy.
Right: Muc luong co ban: 8.000.000 - 12.000.000 (tuy theo nang luc va kinh nghiem lam viec); Phu cap (Xang xe, com trua) + Hoa hong ban hang (danh cho ung vien co the kinh doanh ban hang).; Tieu chi xet duyet tang luong 6 thang moi lan neu nhan vien luon hoan thanh tot cong viec va co y chi cau tien (hoac tang luong som hon voi nhung nhan vien xuat sac); Moi truong lam viec nang dong giup nhan vien hoan thien ky nang va kien thuc.; Duoc tap huan, dao tao ve chuyen mon theo yeu cau cong viec.; Duoc tham gia BHXH, BHYT, BHTN day du theo quy dinh cua phap luat.
Place: 756-758 Truong Chinh, Phuong 15, Quan Tan Binh, Tp.HCM.
Giới thiệu công ty:
QUA TRINH HINH THANH VA PHAT TRIEN

Cua hang Thiet Bi Van Phong Truong Thinh Phat duoc thanh lap vao ngay 20 / 08 / 2008, tu mot nhom anh / em ky thuat o que len thanh pho lap nghiep. Chung toi chuyen den tan noi de lam dich vu, khac phuc xu ly su co cho cac co quan, doanh nghiep nho, ho gia dinh nhu : nap muc may in, xu ly su co may photocopy, lap rap may tinh, cai dat win, cai dat phan mem diet virus, ...

Voi tinh than lam viec khong biet met moi, uy tin trach nhiem, khat vong vuon len trong cuoc song, chung toi nhan duoc su tin yeu cua quy anh / chi tu ho gia dinh, xi nghiep, den phong ban cua cac co quan doanh nghiep tren dia ban thanh pho va cac huyen lan can de giup chung toi ngay mot lon manh dan, phat trien on dinh hon.

Voi tam nhin chien luoc cua ban lanh dao, su chung long cua doi ngu nhan vien ky thuat giup chung toi tao nen nhung thanh qua an tuong tu nam 2008 cho den nay va da nhan duoc su quan tam dac biet cua cac doi tac trong va ngoai nuoc.

Cung voi su chuyen minh manh me cua nen kinh te trong nuoc, Cong ty TNHH TM DV Quoc Te Truong Thinh Phat chinh thuc duoc thanh lap vao ngay 26 thang 08 nam 2016 giay phep kinh doanh so : 0313983189 cua So ke hoach va Dau Tu Thanh pho Ho Chi Minh de nang tam hoat dong, cung nhu dap ung nhu cau tot hon cua quy khach hang.

Company_Name: Cong Ty TNHH Cong Nghe Va Phan Mem Tri Dung
Job: Nhan Vien Kinh Doanh Thiet Bi Am Thanh - Di Lam Ngay
Title: Nhan Vien Kinh Doanh Thiet Bi Am Thanh - Di Lam Ngay
Description: Tu van ban hang cac thiet bi nhu he thong am thanh phong hop, am thanh toa nha, am thanh cong cong, am thanh san khau, anh sang san khau, man hinh Led, he thong camera giam sat, he thong mang may tinh, mang WIFI, he thong bao goi y ta, he thong IoT, smart home, smart farm, smart factory, thiet bi tu dong hoa, phan mem quan ly doanh nghiep,...; Tham gia cac buoi dao tao ve san pham cong ty dang kinh doanh. Tu hoc hoi de nam vung san pham, thiet bi, cong nghe va giai phap de co the tu van tot nhat cho khach hang.; Tim kiem khach hang moi, cac dai ly moi, cac du an moi.; Cham soc khach hang cu.; Lam bao gia.; Tham gia thuong thao va chot hop dong.; Ho tro ke toan hoan thien giay to, hop dong, bien ban ban giao,... (neu co); Ho tro ke toan doi no (neu co).; Ho tro giao hang (neu co).; Bao cao ke hoach kinh doanh hang thang. Bao cao doanh thu hang thang.; Thuc hien cac cong viec khac cong ty giao.
Requirement: Co kinh nghiem kinh doanh ban hang du an hoac dai ly mot trong cac mat hang cong ty kinh doanh (he thong dien nhe, am thanh phong hop, am thanh cong cong, am thanh san khau, anh sang san khau, man hinh LED, camera giam sat, mang may tinh, mang WIFI, kiem soat vao ra cham cong, bao goi y ta, IoT, smart home, smart farm, smart factory, tu dong hoa, phan mem quan ly doanh nghiep).; Co ky nang giao tiep khach hang, ung xu tinh huong tot, co kha nang lam viec nhom.; Trung thuc, can than, co trach nhiem trong cong viec;; Dam me kinh doanh.
Right: Co luong hap dan.; Thuong doanh thu neu vuot muc de ra.; Thuong ngay le, tet thang thu 13, 14, 15 neu dat doanh so de ra.; Duoc dao tao.; Nghi le theo quy dinh cua nha nuoc.; Duoc to tham gia va to chuc cac su kien nhu sinh nhat,...; Co nhieu co hoi thang tien trong tuong lai.
Place: P503, tang 5, toa Licogi 12, so 21 Dai Tu, Dai Kim, Hoang Mai, Ha Noi
Giới thiệu công ty:
Cong ty Tri Dung la nha phan phoi va lap dat camera giam sat an ninh, he thong am thanh, he thong dien nhe khac nhu tong dai, mang, truyen hinh.
Phat trien va ban cac phan mem ban hang, cham cong,...

Company_Name: Cong ty Co phan Thuong mai va Cong nghe A Phong
Title: Nhan Vien Sales - Presales
Description: Nghien cuu va lam chu cac san pham, giai phap Cong nghe thong tin cua cac hang Dell, HPE, Cisco, Fortinet, Checkpoint, Axis,... cu the nhu sau:; Hieu biet cac san pham PC, Laptop, Printer, len thong so ky thuat.; Tu van, thiet ke va xay dung giai phap ky thuat, len cau hinh thong so ky thuat cho cac du an theo yeu cau cua phong kinh doanh va khach hang. Lap du toan theo yeu cau.; Tham gia xay dung va chuan bi Ho so du thau, phu trach cac tai lieu lien quan den ky thuat nhu: Tuyen bo dap ung yeu cau ky thuat, Giai phap ky thuat.; Tham gia xay dung tai lieu tu van: Bao cao nghien cuu kha thi, bao cao thiet ke thi cong, de cuong va du toan chi tiet.; Cap nhat thong tin, phan tich cac giai phap, cong nghe, san pham moi lien quan den cong viec duoc giao.; Ket hop voi bo phan kinh doanh gap go khach hang va ho tro trien khai du an.; Thiet lap quan he voi cac nha cung cap, phan phoi, hang.; Quan ti theo doi giam sat trien khai du an, ho tro bo phan kinh doanh de hoan thien cac thu tuc lien quan den thuc hien hop dong.; Chi tiet cong viec se trao doi ky hon khi phong van.
Requirement: Nam tot nghiep dai hoc chinh quy tro len chuyen nganh: CNTT, dien tu vien thong; Co kinh nghiem toi thieu 03 nam trong linh vuc lien quan.; Ky nang chuyen mon ve CNTT, tu van, thiet ke giai phap; Trung thuc, tuan thu ky luat, nhiet tinh trong cong viec, tu tin va co kha nang giao tiep tot voi khach hang.; Co cac chung chi quoc te ve mang va he thong,.; Co kha nang lam viec chu dong, lam viec doc lap, lam viec theo nhom.
Right: Thu nhap se gom: Luong co ban 25tr/1thang + Thuong cuoi nam theo KPI dat duoc.; Duoc huong day du cac quyen loi va bao hiem theo quy dinh hien hanh (BHXH, BHYT, BHTN...), che do nghi mat, phuc loi cong ty.; Moi truong lam viec nang dong, than thien va chuyen nghiep.; Thoi gian lam viec: Tu thu 2 den thu 6 hang tuan. Nghi thu 7, Chu nhat va cac ngay le.
Place: So 6 Pho Duong Dinh Nghe, Phuong Yen Hoa, quan Cau Giay, Thanh Pho Ha Noi
Giới thiệu công ty: Cong ty Co Phan Thuong mai va Cong nghe A Phong thanh lap tu nam 2007, trai qua 12 nam hoat dong va phat trien, A Phong da co duoc vi tri dang ke tai thi truong CNTT Viet Nam. Cong ty chuyen cung cap cac thiet bi ve linh vuc Cong nghe thong tin cung nhu cac san pham phan mem cho cac doanh nghiep, cac co quan bo nganh, truong hoc benh vien... o mot so tinh va thanh pho: Ha Noi, Hai Phong, Hai Duong, Vinh Phuc, Bac Ninh... Den voi A Phong, quy khach hang co the duoc huong nhung loi the rat lon nhu gia thanh het suc uu dai va cac dich vu ho tro tot nhat co the. Voi he thong doi tac nay, A Phong co the cung cap cac san pham va dich vu moi nhat, tot nhat cua the gioi trong linh vuc CNTT, Vien thong cho khach hang tai Viet Nam.

Company_Name: Cong ty Co phan Tong hop Viet Nhat
Job: Ky Su Lap Trinh Aws (Software Engineer Be / Fe)
Title: Ky Su Lap Trinh Aws (Software Engineer Be / Fe)
Place: Dia chi: Tang 14, toa nha ICON4 TOWER, 243A La Thanh, Dong Da, Ha Noi
Giới thiệu công ty:
Cong ty Co phan Tong hop Viet Nhat (ten viet tat: VINICORP) duoc thanh lap thang 5 / 2007 va co tru so chinh tai Ha Noi, Viet Nam. VINICORP chuyen cung cap dich vu gia cong va phat trien phan mem chat luong cao cho cac doanh nghiep Nhat Ban tai thi truong Nhat Ban, Viet Nam va Singapore. Voi hon 90% khach hang cua VINICORP la cac doanh nghiep Nhat Ban trong va ngoai nuoc.

VINICORP cung duoc vinh du nam trong 30 doanh nghiep duoc Hiep hoi Phan mem va Dich vu CNTT Viet Nam (VINASA) binh chon la nhung Doanh nghiep CNTT hang dau Viet Nam 2014 (Vietnam's 30 Leading ICT Companies 2014).

Doi hoat dong kinh doanh huong toi thi truong nuoc ngoai chung toi co the tu hao voi nhung ket qua gan day nhu sau:
1, Mot ung dung iOS duoc VINICORP phat trien da tung dat so luong download cao nhat trong linh vuc giao duc cua Nhat Ban.
2, San pham Container Loader da doat huy chuong vang trong linh vuc cai thien hieu qua san xuat cua mot tap doan dien tu hang dau tren the gioi.
3, Cong ty vien thong hang dau Nhat Ban da chon chung toi lam doi tac chien luoc trong linh vuc gia cong phan mem.

Website:
http:// vinicorp.com.vn /
DIA CHI:
Tru so chinh : Tang 14, toa nha ICON4 TOWER, 243A La Thanh, Lang Thuong, Dong Da, Ha Noi

Company_Name: Cong Ty TNHH Thuong Mai Va Phat Trien Dich Vu Ky Thuat (Escom)
Job: Nhan Vien Giai Phap Vien Thong - CNTT
Title: Nhan Vien Giai Phap Vien Thong - CNTT
Place: P602, Toa Hanoi Group, so 445 Doi Can - Phuong Vinh Phuc - Quan Ba Dinh - Ha Noi.
Giới thiệu công ty: Thanh lap vao thang 1 / 2006, Escom la nha cung cap cac giai phap cong nghe, dich vu trong linh vuc Vien thong, CNTT, Truyen thong. Doi ngu nhan su duoc dao tao chuyen sau, day dan kinh nghiem la nen tang de Escom khang dinh vi tri cua nha tu van & cung cap san pham chat luong cao, giup khach hang co the phat trien duoc cac chien luoc kinh doanh, dam bao chat luong dich vu va tang kha nang chuyen doi, tang truong doanh thu.

Company_Name: Cong Ty Co Phan Vien Thong Fpt
Job: Truong Phong Kinh Doanh Tai Vinh Long
Title: Truong Phong Kinh Doanh Tai Vinh Long
Description: Xay dung ke hoach phat trien thi truong thue bao vien thong Internet, FPT Play, FPT Camera, FPT Smart home...; Theo doi, giam sat, thuc hien cac phuong phap thuc day hoat dong kinh doanh nham dam bao cac chi tieu duoc giao.; Chiu trach nhiem quan ly, giao chi tieu va dao tao chuyen mon nghiep vu cho can bo nhan vien thuoc quyen quan ly.; Tap hop, xay dung doi ngu can bo nhan vien thau cam, tao ra nhung tuong tac, trai nghiem ca nhan hoa toi nguoi dung/khach hang tren cac kenh (online/offline) o moi diem cham. Xay dung van hoa tinh than lam viec, thuc day can bo nhan vien lam viec hieu qua va gan ket.; Phoi hop cung voi cac phong ban co lien quan nham dam bao hoat dong kinh doanh duoc dien ra thuan loi va xuyen suot.; Thuc hien cac cong viec khac theo yeu cau cua cap tren.
Requirement: Tot nghiep Dai hoc tro len.; Toi thieu 2 nam kinh nghiem lam viec o vi tri quan ly kinh doanh, hieu biet ro ve thi truong kinh doanh dang phu trach.; Chu dong, quyet doan, sang tao trong cong viec, ky nang giao tiep va thuyet trinh tot.; Co ky nang lap ke hoach, trien khai, theo doi va danh gia hieu qua cong viec.; Co ky nang ve to chuc, dao tao va phat trien doi ngu, co tu duy luon lay khach hang lam trong tam.; Co ky nang ve marketing online.; Ung vien am hieu ve cac san pham dich vu Vien Thong, am hieu ve Marketing la mot loi the.
Right: Goi thu nhap nam tuong xung voi nang luc (13 thang luong, thuong hieu qua kinh doanh, thuong Quy, Nam...).; Co hoi lam viec va phat trien tai FPT, Cong ty tien phong chuyen doi so va dan dau ve tu van, cung cap, trien khai cac dich vu, giai phap cong nghe - vien thong.; Duoc dao tao Nghiep vu va Ky Nang Quan ly lien tuc, duoc tham gia cac chuong trinh huan luyen chuyen nghiep.; Moi truong lam viec cong bang, minh bach, than thien, coi mo, nang dong va tre trung. Co so vat chat, cong cu lam viec hien dai, tien nghi, ung dung cong nghe, chuyen doi so toan trinh.; Van hoa doanh nghiep da dang, phong phu; cac hoat dong tri an, cham lo doi song tinh than Can bo nhan vien va nguoi than, Teambuilding, Ngay hoi van hoa, cac Cau lac bo, Nghi he...; Tham gia day du cac che do theo Luat lao dong hien hanh (BHXH, BHYT, BHTN...); Kham suc khoe dinh ky, nghi he hang nam; Goi bao hiem suc khoe chuyen biet FPT Care danh cho viec kham va chua benh noi, ngoai tru.; Co hoi thang tien len cac vi tri Giam doc trung tam, Giam doc chi nhanh.
Place: 68/11A Pham Thai Buong, phuong 4, thanh pho Vinh Long, tinh Vinh Long.
Giới thiệu công ty:
Cong ty Co phan Vien thong FPT (ten goi tat la FPT Telecom) hien la mot trong nhung nha cung cap dich vu Vien thong va Internet hang dau khu vuc.
Thanh lap ngay 31/01/1997, khoi nguon tu Trung tam Dich vu Truc tuyen do 4 thanh vien sang lap cung san pham mang Intranet dau tien cua Viet Nam mang ten "Tri tue Viet Nam - TTVN", san pham duoc coi la dat nen mong cho su phat trien cua Internet tai Viet Nam

Title: Quan Ly Thiet Ke Website

Company_Name: Cong Ty Co Phan Thuong Mai Dich Vu Tin Hoa
Title: Nhan Vien Kinh Doanh / Telesales
Place: 11A Tran Khanh Du - Phuong Tan Dinh - Quan 1- Tp. HCM
Giới thiệu công ty: Cong ty CP TMDV TIN HOA, mot thanh vien cua Grand-Flo Group, la nha cung cap chuyen nghiep hang dau cac thiet bi va giai phap ung dung ma vach va RFID gom may in, may quet ma vach, may tinh va may in di dong, thiet bi ghi so lieu cam tay, thiet bi kiem tra chat luong ma vach.
